channel.title: Advanced Cognition Labs
channel.description: Recent content on Advanced Cognition Labs

item.title: General Seminar
item.description: Welcome to the ACL! The ACL General Seminar has begun. Talks will be given every Friday at 4pm. Send an email with the title “General Seminar” to contact@acl.institute in order to join.

item.title: About
item.description: Advanced Cognition Labs is an interdisciplinary research center based in Tokyo, Japan. Our main focus is on the following topics Artificial Intelligence Cognitive Science Cybernetics Psychometrics Methods based on Category Theory and Algebraic Topology in the context of AI See the Posts section for announcements. Follow us on Twitter. You can send us an email to: contact AT acl DOT institute.
